overview: Her life at a crossroads, this Hollywood star goes undercover into the adult film world in a last ditch effort to save her career. Falling in love with the man of her dreams, she must choose to move forward or dwell in her past. Will she risk it all for one last chance to be on top?
tagline: Her career at a crossroads, this Hollywood star will risk it all for one last chance to be on top.
title: Pornstar
